content: That's a great list of tips for managing my time effectively. I'll definitely make sure to create a schedule, prioritize tasks, and break them down into smaller chunks. I'll also use technology to my advantage and learn to say no to non-essential tasks. I'm confident that with these tips, I'll be able to balance my work, volunteer work, and potential MBA studies. Speaking of my volunteer work, I've been helping with the STEM program at the local non-profit organization. I'm interested in exploring ways to incorporate data analysis and visualization into the program to make it more engaging and effective. Do you have any suggestions on how I can do that?
